entities.name: GOODWILL
entities.description: Goodwill is an intangible asset that arises when a buyer acquires an existing business

entities.name: RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT COSTS
entities.description: Research and Development Costs refer to expenses associated with the research and development of a company's products or services

entities.name: LEGAL AND OTHER CONTINGENCIES
entities.description: Legal and Other Contingencies refer to potential liabilities that a company might face due to legal proceedings or claims brought against it
